summary.span: 定义用于 Microsoft Windows Media 照片编码图像的解码器。

span.span: Defines a decoder for Microsoft Windows Media Photo encoded images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wdp](~/includes/tlasharptla-wdp-md.md)] 是一种新的编解码器，提供比具有较小文件大小的 JPEG 图像保真度更高和更多的功能。 is a new codec that provides better image fidelity than JPEG with smaller file sizes and more features. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 映像通过使用单一算法实现有损和无损压缩。 images achieve lossy and lossless compression by using a single algorithm. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 映像支持现有的元数据标准。 images support existing metadata standards. 有关此格式的其他信息，请参阅[Windows Media 照片规范](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/wmphoto.mspx)。For additional information about this format, see the [Windows Media Photo Specification](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/wmphoto.mspx).
